features: Washing machine, balcony, bicycle cellar, elevator

description.Apartment:
** Please read everything **

Hello, my dears,

I hand over my small but super nice apartment!

The apartment is ideal for people who want to live alone for the first time or single people, the only thing you need are your clothes and the rest is taken careyou see them in the pictures.

!!Important!!The apartment is handed over completely, as a discount I would like to have 1,800 €

Accept the furniture (€ 1,800):
- a huge wardrobe
- sofa bed
- Wall wall (4 tlg.)
- Balcony furniture (5 tlg.)
- Balcony chest
- 2 Bad Schränke
- 2 bar stools
- 5 ceiling lamps


Briefly to the apartment:
The balcony is the absolute hammer, as a hobby athlete I put my rowing device or home trainer there in summer and did a lot of sports, organized many barbecues or just put up my air mattress to sunbathe.:)) The sun shines in the apartment from 2 p.m. and you can treat yourself to a cozy sunny end of the day.

The apartment is on the 3 floor and the house has a large elevator and the neighbors are all mega.

You are welcome to look at the apartments for the days.

Best regards Carolina
description.Position: You are quite well connected, the next stop is 5 minutes away from the Lidl.Even in front of the stop, you have a petrol station/REWE TOGO 24/7, a REWE, pharmacy, ice cream parlor, sushi and much more directly around the corner, and the Decksteiner pond is only about 1km away and the way there is very green, I love to run there or go on a bike and then on site or just go for a walk.
description.Miscellaneous: You have a small cute fitted kitchen that is held in the rent, you should study at the University of Cologne at the university, you are quite well connected from here.

description.Apartment:
Pretty, sunny one -room apartment in the middle of the Belgian quarter - Genter Straße is a quiet one -way street between Rudolfplatz and Friesenplatz - tub, French balcony, pantry kitchen with refrigerator, basement room.The apartment can also be fully furnished (bed, desks, chest of drawers, sisal carpet) for a small distance payment (VB 500,- €) to the previous tenant (no condition)

The heating and hot water treatment takes place via gas, costs according to the previous tenant monthly.60,- €.This amount is not included in the additional costs, the billing is done directly with the provider.The provider can be chosen freely.

You can't live more centrally, great location
description.Position: Calm one -way bike.Between Rudolfplatz and Friesenplatz.Everything is easy to reach on foot, restaurants, shops, doctors, trams, pubs - you live calmly and still in the middle of life.
description.Miscellaneous:
Like to rental to students (with parent guarantee).BACIATION Either bar or bank guarantee on the first request without the objection of the objection.Cash insurance is not accepted.

If there is a serious interest, please bring to the sightseeing star.

Please contact me by email with a short performance, I'll get in touch with you regarding a viewing date.The visit is expected to take place on Wednesday or Thursday.
